awd_abstract_narration: A shared - memory multiprocessor will be provided for researchers at            Kent State University for research in the Department of Mathematical            Sciences.                                                                                                                                                       This equipment is provided under the Instrumentation Grants for                 Research in Computer and Information Science and Engineering program.                                                                                           The research for which the equipment is to be used will be in the areas         of:                                                                                                                                                                  Parallel Algorithms and Implementations for Symbolic Computations                                                                                               Automatic Parallel Code Generation                                                                                                                              Parallel Algorithms for the Numerical Solution of Linear Systems                                                                                                Parallel Computing for Engineering Applications                                                                                                                 Multiprocessing Languages and Operating Environments
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
